TopicTitle: you may have to pay more for jeb to fly your planes.

Articles.Content:
on the kerbals they have a certain skill set such as jebediah.

which has

courage:-------------

stupidity:------------

he has half courage and half stupidity

which makes him a balanced pilot.

others like neilrim kerman

courage:---------------

stupidity:-----

which has courage all the way up but not stupidity. making him more reliable to do dangerous tasks.

as for say neddley kerman

courage:----

stupidity:-----------------

which has stupidity all the way up but not courage. making him unreliable and less likely to do major important tasks.

so will this play in making the game more realistic? my theory is that the better kerbals are expensive like neilrim kerman or jebediah kerman.

while making the more worse pilots less expensive like neddley and bob kerman.

and that the better kerbals will do more task for you like flying,landing,getting samples,riding rovers and more.

while worse kerbals will not do as much or perhaps worse.
